message.better_client.book_save.title: Save Book
message.better_client.book_save.question: Are you sure you want to close the book without saving?
yacl3.config.better_client:config.enable: Enable Fading Out Night Vision
Night vision now fades out instead of flickering.
yacl3.config.better_client:config.fading: Duration of night vision effect fade out
yacl3.config.better_client:config.enable: Enable Better Ping Display
The player's ping is now displayed as a number.
Enable Default Ping Bars
The vanilla ping bars will also show.
Enable Longer Chat History
Chat history now extends from the vanilla 100 to 4096.
yacl3.config.better_client:config.chatMa: Maximum number of messages retained in chat history
yacl3.config.better_client:config.enable: Enable Time Stamp
The time is now displayed before the chat message.
yacl3.config.better_client:config.timeSt: The color of the time displayed
yacl3.config.better_client:config.enable: Enable Biome Title
Entering a new biome now displays the biome title.
yacl3.config.better_client:config.hideIn: The title will not be displayed in the F1 screen.
The title will not be displayed in the F3 screen.
yacl3.config.better_client:config.displa: Title display time except fade-in/fade-out time
yacl3.config.better_client:config.yOffse: Taking the center of the screen minus the height of the title as the origin of the coordinate axis, the offset of the coordinate axis of y
yacl3.config.better_client:config.cooldo: Entering a new biome when the cooldown is set to 0 will directly switch titles.
yacl3.config.better_client:config.enable: Enable Mod Name
Mod names are now displayed after the biome name.
Enable Underground Update
The title is also displayed when the player is underground.
Enable Faster Climbing
The speed at which you climb the ladder now changes depending on your viewpoint orientation when you're on the ladder.
Enable Faster Upward
Whether to enable faster upward laddering.
Enable Faster Downward
Whether to enable faster downward laddering.
yacl3.config.better_client:config.speedM: Speed multiplier, multiplied by the angle sin value, 2.0 corresponds to 30 degrees for the original speed.
yacl3.config.better_client:config.enable: Enable Bee Info
You can now see the number of bees and the amount of honey in beehives and bee nests, just like the feature added natively in 1.21.2.
Enable Axolotl Bucket Fix
Now buckets containing different variants of axolotl display different textures.
Enable Chat History Retention
Leaving the world now will not clear your chat history.
Enable Book Save Confirmation
When you make changes to the content of a book and close it without saving, a prompt will pop up reminding you to save.
